job.title: Senior Test Automation Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer & Network Security
job.description: ltstronggtltugtAbout OneloginltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtOneLogin the leader in Unified Access Management connects people with technology through a simple and secure login empowering organizations to access the world The OneLogin Unified Access Management UAM platform is the key to unlocking the apps devices and data that drive productivity and facilitate collaboration OneLogin serves businesses and partners across a multitude of industries with over 2500 customers worldwide We are headquartered in San Francisco California For more information visit wwwonelogincom Blog Facebook Twitter or LinkedInltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout The RoleltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtDrive automation testing efforts including but not limited to creating and executing test plans test case development and test statusltligtltligtDesign build and maintain automation testing tools infrastructure and pipelines for efficient and reliable testing and deploymentltligtltligtImplement and own continuous testing of our development process and provide a unified view of platform healthltligtltligtParticipate in code reviews and provide feedback to engineersltligtltligtParticipate in troubleshooting investigating debugging and help define the best practice for healthier production environmentltligtltligtCollaborate and build trusted relationships with various teams such as engineering product manager and customer successltligtltligtMentor your teammates in testing best practicesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtAbout Youltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt5 years of extensive handson quality engineering and automation experienceltligtltligtSenior level proficiency in at least one programming language Ruby Java Python etc Nodejs a plus with at least 2 years in a role where coding was your primary responsibilityltligtltligtBachelors degree in Computer Science Engineering or related fieldltligtltligtDemonstrated experience in automation testing in Cloud environments such as AWS Google or AzureltligtltligtDemonstrated experience with Selenium Puppeteer or other open source automation testing toolsltligtltligtExperience with Unit Testing and Integration Testing frameworksltligtltligtExperience with CICD system TeamCity Travis CI Bamboo or JenkinsltligtltligtFamiliarity with distributed version control systems such as GitltligtltligtDemonstrated ability to communicate effectively and build trusted relationships with various functions across engineers product managers and customer successltbrgtltligtltulgtOur core valuesltbrgtltulgtltligtSecurity first  We make it our 1 priority to protect data and privacy From the way we work to the technology we provide security is top of mindltligtltligtCustomer focused  We design for listen to and partner with customers to come up with smart solutions that drive business valueltligtltligtCollaborative  We take bold steps and work together to thrive across boundaries We drive productivity as we grow as one teamltligtltligtAccountable  We get things done and take ownership in our work Showcasing consistent quality and pride to perform at the highest levelsltligtltligtCreative  We embody creativity in everything we do We embrace a diversity of ideas We execute with ingenuity flexibility and agilityltbrgtltligtltulgtBring your design collaboration and problemsolving skills from IT or another profession We value employees with different backgrounds education experience and perspective and strive to create an inclusive and welcoming work environmentltbrgtltbrgtOneLogin is proud to provide equal employment opportunities EEO to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin age
